mapper.select: select pr.productReviewIdx, pr.productIdx, pr.memberIdx, m.memberImg, m.memberId, pr.title, pr.createDate, pr.updateDate, pr.content from productReview pr left join product p on pr.productIdx = p.productIdx left join member m on pr.memberIdx = m.memberIdx where pr.productIdx = #{productIdx} and pr.status = 'ACTIVE' order by createDate DESC
mapper.insert: insert into productReview( productReviewIdx, productIdx, memberIdx, title, content, createDate, updateDate, status ) values( productReview_seq.nextval, #{productIdx}, #{memberIdx}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, default )
mapper.update: update productReview set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updateDate = sysdate where productIdx = #{productIdx} and productReviewIdx = #{productReviewIdx} and status = 'ACTIVE'
